article: with democrats taking control of the u.s. congress , prospects have increased that lawmakers will approve a resolution recognizing the world war i-era killings of armenians as genocide -- despite the objections of president george w. bush .
abstract: change in u.s. congress boosts prospects for armenian genocide resolution
